TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAnchorInfo

summary.span: 提供比對附註與對應標註物件的功能。

span.span: Provides the capabilities for matching annotations with the corresponding annotated objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 請考慮具有註解 窗格的簡單的文件讀取器應用程式。Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane. 註解窗格可能是清單方塊，其中顯示來自錨定到文件之註釋清單的文字。The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document. 如果使用者在清單方塊中選取項目，則應用程式會將對應註釋物件所錨定之文件中的段落帶入檢視。If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to. 下列範例會示範如何實作這類做為註解 窗格的清單方塊的事件處理常式：The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane: [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#handler)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#handler)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Anchor As AnnotationResource

span.span: Gets the anchor of the annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

public: property System::Windows::Annotations::Annotation ^ Annotation { System::Windows::Annotations::Annotation ^ get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResolvedAnchor As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ResolvedAnchor { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得物件，表示樹狀目錄中已解析 的位置。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the location on the tree where the is resolved.

value.span: 物件，表示樹狀目錄中已解析 的位置。

span.span: The object that represents the location on the tree where the is resolved.

value.span: 此型別是由標註物件的型別指定。

span.span: The type is specified by the type of the annotated object.

value.span: 非固定格式或固定格式文件中的自黏便箋和醒目提示一定會解析為 物件。

span.span: Sticky notes and highlights in flow or fixed documents always resolve to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中導入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。 is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 請考慮具有註解 窗格的簡單的文件讀取器應用程式。Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane. 註解窗格可能是清單方塊，其中顯示來自錨定到文件之註釋清單的文字。The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document. 如果使用者在清單方塊中選取項目，則應用程式會將對應註釋物件所錨定之文件中的段落帶入檢視。If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to. 下列範例會示範如何實作這類做為註解 窗格的清單方塊的事件處理常式：The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane: [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#handler)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#handler)]
